Title: Analysis of Visible Light-Based ISAC Channel Characteristics in a V2V Scenario
Contribution: The paper investigates the visible light-based integrated sensing and communication channel characteristics in V2V scenarios using ray-tracing simulations.

Title: Photonic Terahertz Integrated Sensing and Communication (ISAC) Systems
Contribution: The paper presents advancements in photonic THz-ISAC systems, emphasizing integrated waveform design, coherent fusion processing, and communication enhancements through sensing.

Title: Modulation Strategies for Robust Optical Wireless Communications and Sensing in 6G
Contribution: The paper explores the use of CE-OFDM for VLC systems in 6G, highlighting its potential for joint communication and localization.

Title: Adiabatic-tapered few-mode-fiber-based system for integrating optical fiber sensing and telecommunication
Contribution: The proposed system integrates optical fiber sensing and telecommunication functions in a long-haul FMF, enabling smart monitoring in telecommunication networks

Title: Integrated Sensing and Communication for UAV Trajectory Optimization in Mixed FSO-RF Networks in Dynamic Weather Conditions
Contribution: The paper proposes a novel O-ISAC framework for UAV-aided mixed FSO-RF networks, which optimizes the UAV's trajectory using directional antenna beamwidth and bandwidth allocation.

Title: Recent Advancements and Challenges in Integrated Sensing and Communication in Optical Fiber
Contribution: This paper reviews the recent advancements and challenges in integrated sensing and communication in optical fiber.

Title: Miniaturized optical fiber displacement probe with large-collection-angle
Contribution: A miniaturized optical fiber displacement probe with large-collection-angle is proposed.

Title: Wide-steering Integrated Sensing and Communication OPA-based Lidar Design with Joint Waveform and Thinned Antenna
Contribution: The paper proposes an ISAC OPA-based Lidar system design with QPSK-FMCW joint waveform and thinned ring antenna.

Title: High-speed DMT signal and power-over-fiber simultaneous transmission over weakly-coupled multicore Fiber
Contribution: The paper demonstrates the simultaneous transmission of 60 W power-over-fiber signal with 117 Gbit/s and 140 Gbit/s high-speed DMT signal in an IM-DD system over 1 km 7-core multicore fiber.
